title: LF pals for flex/tournaments/clash ❤
body:
I have been a part of a few teams in the past that always end up disbanding or never playing together for whatever reason. 

I am looking for some players dedicated on working together to climb the flex ladder, hoard clash rewards and participate in the occasional weekend/weeknight tournament. 

> Requiements:
- 20+ years of age 
- Gold-plat in soloq and flex q
- working mic
- not a jerk
- decent availability to play with the team 2-3x a week

You can either add me in the client (IGN: Ingénue) or leave a message on here and i'll add you :)

GLHF to everyone playing this season ❤

replies.body: I can look up your IGN but cant add you :(
I've added you so hopefully it works :)
